import {React,useState}from 'react' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import {faBed,faCalendarDays,faCar,faPerson,faPlane,faTaxi } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import { DateRange } from 'react-date-range'; import "./Header.css" import 'react-date-range/dist/styles.css'; // main css file import 'react-date-range/dist/theme/default.css'; // theme css file import {format} from "date-fns" function Header() { const [opendate,setopendate]=useState(false) const [date, dateState] = useState([ { startDate: new Date(), endDate: new Date(), key: 'selection' } ]); return (

{`${format(date[0].startDate, "MM/dd/yyyy")} to ${format( date[0].endDate, "MM/dd/yyyy" )}`} {opendate && dateState([item.selection])} moveRangeOnFirstSelection={false} ranges={date} className="date" />}

) } export default Header
